thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 2 of 113
thread.title: Emily

author: Emily
title: Emily
text: Been using them for quite some time and had multiple orders. They are quick to let me know if there are any kind of problem with the cater I picked and they help recommend another if the one I picked has an issue. The only con I have is some of the locations I need only have limited breakfast choices and I hate when I pick a breakfast place and they don't offer coffee! If I'm feeding a group for breakfast they want coffee. I also usually spend right around $100 for each meal. Hate there are some I would use but minimum is $200+. Otherwise I have been very happy using Ezcater.
